item.title: Supermemo: repetition is the very soul of the net
item.description: I wrote about SuperMemo some months back, but if I've told you once, I've told you 146 times: repetition is the very soul of the net. SuperMemo is a piece of software from P A Wozniak, originally developed in 1987 as a DOS program for learning languages.  Wozniak, a student of molecular biology, was frustrated by the amount of knowledge he lost after cramming for an exam, and worked to develop methods for improving long term memory.
